nodes.id: 第八届台北市第四选举区立法委员蔡正元罢免案

zh-cn: 第八届台北市第四选举区立法委员蔡正元罢免案

description.zh-cn: 一场针对时任中国国民党籍立法委员蔡正元的罢免投票。该案最终因投票人数未达到选举人总数的二分之一，即投票率未达门槛而宣告失败。此事引发了对罢免制度的广泛讨论，并直接推动了次年《公职人员选举罢免法》的修正。
description.en: A recall election targeting then-Kuomintang legislator Tsai Cheng-yuan. The recall failed because the voter turnout did not meet the legal threshold of half the total eligible voters. This event sparked widespread discussion about the recall system and directly led to the amendment of the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' the following year.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，在担任第8届立法委员期间成为罢免案的目标。
description.en: A Kuomintang politician who was the target of a recall election during his term as an 8th-term legislator.

description.zh-cn: 发起蔡正元罢免案的选民之一。
description.en: One of the voters who initiated the recall petition against Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 发起蔡正元罢免案的选民之一。
description.en: One of the voters who initiated the recall petition against Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 发起蔡正元罢免案的选民之一。
description.en: One of the voters who initiated the recall petition against Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 发起蔡正元罢免案的台湾社会运动团体。
description.en: A Taiwanese social movement group that initiated the recall election against Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 规范中华民国公职人员选举与罢免事宜的法律。蔡正元罢免案的失败推动了该法律在2016年的修正。
description.en: The law governing the election and recall of public officials in the Republic of China. The failure of the Tsai Cheng-yuan recall case prompted amendments to this law in 2016.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，蔡正元所属政党。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, to which Tsai Cheng-yuan belongs.

description.zh-cn: 指代中华民国第八届立法院（2012-2016）全体委员的集合，也是蔡正元当时担任的职务届次。
description.en: Refers to the collective body of members of the 8th Legislative Yuan of the Republic of China (2012-2016), which was the term of office Tsai Cheng-yuan held at the time.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物。在蔡正元的罢免答辩书中被点名批评，后对《公职人员选举罢免法》修正案表示支持。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician. He was singled out for criticism in Tsai Cheng-yuan's defense statement for the recall and later supported the amendment to the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，在蔡正元罢免案的答辩书中被提及并受到批评。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur who was mentioned and criticized in Tsai Cheng-yuan's defense statement for the recall.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，对因蔡正元罢免案而推动的《公职人员选举罢免法》修正表示支持。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who expressed support for the amendment to the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act', which was prompted by the Tsai Cheng-yuan recall case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，对因蔡正元罢免案而推动的《公职人员选举罢免法》修正表示支持。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who expressed support for the amendment to the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act', which was prompted by the Tsai Cheng-yuan recall case.

nodes.id: 中华民国中央选举委员会

zh-cn: 中华民国中央选举委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管选举、罢免、公民投票等事务的独立机关，负责了蔡正元罢免案的选务工作。
description.en: An independent agency of the Republic of China responsible for managing elections, recalls, and referendums. It oversaw the electoral affairs of the Tsai Cheng-yuan recall case.

description.zh-cn: 作为罢免案发起人之一，提议罢免时任立法委员蔡正元。
description.en: As one of the initiators of the recall petition, proposed the recall of then-legislator Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为罢免案发起人之一，提议罢免时任立法委员蔡正元。
description.en: As one of the initiators of the recall petition, proposed the recall of then-legislator Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为罢免案发起人之一，提议罢免时任立法委员蔡正元。
description.en: As one of the initiators of the recall petition, proposed the recall of then-legislator Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 作为罢免案的发动团体，推动对时任立法委员蔡正元的罢免投票。
description.en: As the initiating group of the recall case, it promoted the recall vote against then-legislator Tsai Cheng-yuan.

description.zh-cn: 蔡正元为中国国民党籍政治人物。
description.en: Tsai Cheng-yuan is a politician affiliated with the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 在罢免案发生时，蔡正元担任台北市第四选举区第8届立法委员。
description.en: At the time of the recall case, Tsai Cheng-yuan served as the 8th-term legislator for Taipei City's 4th electoral district.

relationships.target: 第八届台北市第四选举区立法委员蔡正元罢免案

description.zh-cn: 该罢免案依照当时的《公职人员选举罢免法》规则进行，并因未达到该法规定的“双二一”投票门槛而宣告失败。
description.en: The recall election was conducted according to the rules of the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' at the time and was declared unsuccessful for failing to meet the law's threshold requiring turnout from at least half the electorate and a majority of 'yes' votes.

relationships.source: 第八届台北市第四选举区立法委员蔡正元罢免案

description.zh-cn: 此次罢免案因投票率门槛过高而失败，直接推动了2016年《公职人员选举罢免法》的修正，降低了罢免门槛。
description.en: The failure of this recall case due to the high voter turnout threshold directly prompted the amendment of the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' in 2016, which lowered the recall thresholds.

description.zh-cn: 在其罢免案的答辩书中，蔡正元指责黄国昌立场偏颇，认为其不应不受监督。
description.en: In his defense statement for the recall case, Tsai Cheng-yuan accused Huang Kuo-chang of being biased and argued that he should not be beyond supervision.

description.zh-cn: 在其罢免案的答辩书中，蔡正元批评林荣三一方面批评ECFA，另一方面又在中国大陆赚钱。
description.en: In his defense statement for the recall case, Tsai Cheng-yuan criticized Lin Rong-san for denouncing the ECFA while simultaneously profiting from business in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 在《公职人员选举罢免法》于2016年完成修法降低门槛后，称此为全民的胜利。
description.en: After the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' was amended in 2016 to lower the thresholds, the group hailed it as a victory for all citizens.

description.zh-cn: 在《公职人员选举罢免法》于2016年完成修法降低门槛后，称此为全民的胜利。
description.en: After the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' was amended in 2016 to lower the thresholds, he hailed it as a victory for all citizens.

description.zh-cn: 在《公职人员选举罢免法》于2016年完成修法降低门槛后，称此为全民的胜利。
description.en: After the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' was amended in 2016 to lower the thresholds, he hailed it as a victory for all citizens.

description.zh-cn: 在《公职人员选举罢免法》于2016年完成修法降低门槛后，称此绝对符合民意。
description.en: After the 'Public Officials Election and Recall Act' was amended in 2016 to lower the thresholds, he stated that the change absolutely conformed to public opinion.

relationships.source: 中华民国中央选举委员会
relationships.target: 第八届台北市第四选举区立法委员蔡正元罢免案

description.zh-cn: 作为选务主管机关，负责宣告罢免案成立、发布公告、办理投票与开票、并公告罢免结果。
description.en: As the election authority, it was responsible for declaring the recall petition valid, issuing public notices, conducting the voting and ballot counting, and announcing the recall result.
